appsgate.lig.agenda.core.impl
Class CoreiCalImpl

java.lang.Object
  appsgate.lig.agenda.core.impl.CoreiCalImpl

public class CoreiCalImpl
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used as a core agenda. An instance of this class will match a remote agenda on the cloud

Since:
May 14, 2013
Version:
0.0.1
Author:
Cédric Gérard

subscribeNextEventNotifications

private void subscribeNextEventNotifications()
This private method is use to prepare the instance to trigger ApAM notifications concerning the beginning and the end of the next event and corresponding alarms.

notifyEventAlarm

public NotificationMsg notifyEventAlarm(int type,
                                        net.fortuna.ical4j.model.component.VEvent event,
                                        net.fortuna.ical4j.model.component.VAlarm alarm)
This method uses the ApAM message model. Each call produce a AlarmNotificationMsg or EventNotificationMsg object, that notify ApAM that a new message has been released.

Returns:
nothing, it just notifies ApAM that a new message has been posted.
